title: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City

title: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City
notes:
Works fine ✓ but:
- You have to press [Alt]+[Enter] when it launches, otherwise it's stuck as transparent window and soon after this it crashes,
- After this it works fine at fullscreen (set it to 1920x1080 in options),
- Don't remember if it's a Linux thing but you can only change *horizontal* mouse sensitivity, while vertical stays very sensitive, so you might want to keep it default and e.g. instead switch to lower DPI on your mouse,
- Steam Overlay and screenshots work out of the box,
- Otherwise: game saves work and it works smoothly with "single click"!

title: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City
notes:
You sometimes need to manually change focus to the Wine window, to play the game. 

Played for 15 minutes, seems stable enough. Sounds work, music works. Controls work fine. Didn't test using a controller.

title: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City

notes: Runs perfectly. If your computer appears to lock up or you get 'unhandled exception error' just hit ALT + ENTER and works like nothing is wrong.
